26 namespace Mutation {
27 namespace Utilities {
28 namespace IO {
29 
30 //==============================================================================
31 
32 static std::string uniqueFileName(const char* const extension)
33 {
34  // List of characters to use in the file name
35  const std::string char_set =
36  "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ";
37 
38  static unsigned short lfsr = std::clock();
39  unsigned short bit;
40  std::string name;
41 
42  do {
43  name.clear();
44 
45  // Use simple linear feedback shift register to generate name
46  for (int i = 0; i < 10; ++i) {
47  bit = ((lfsr >> 0) ^ (lfsr >> 2) ^ (lfsr >> 3) ^ (lfsr >> 5)) & 1;
48  lfsr = (lfsr >> 1) | (bit << 15);
49  name += char_set[lfsr % char_set.length()];
50  }
51  name += extension;
52  } while (std::ifstream(name.c_str()).is_open());
53 
54  return name;
55 }
56 
57 //==============================================================================
58 
59 TemporaryFile::TemporaryFile(const char* const extension) :
60  m_filename(uniqueFileName(extension)), m_delete(true)
61 {
62  // Create the file
63  if (!std::ofstream(m_filename.c_str()).is_open())
64  throw Error("cannot create file")
65  << "Trying to create temporary file \"" << m_filename << "\".";
66 
67  // Open with read/write access
68  open();
69 }
70 
71 //==============================================================================
72 
73 TemporaryFile::~TemporaryFile()
74 {
75  // Close and delete the file
76  if (m_fstream.is_open()) m_fstream.close();
77  if (m_delete) std::remove(m_filename.c_str());
78 }
79 
80 //==============================================================================
81 
82 void TemporaryFile::open()
83 {
84  if (!m_fstream.is_open())
85  m_fstream.open(m_filename.c_str());
86 
87  if (!m_fstream.is_open())
88  throw Error("cannot open file")
89  << "Trying to open temporary file \"" << m_filename << "\".";
90 }
91 
92 } // namespace IO
93 } // namespace Utilities
94 } // namespace Mutation
